products.name: samsung s25 ultra
products.description: A premium Android flagship featuring a powerful camera system with a 200MP main sensor, a built-in S Pen for precision, and a brilliant, adaptive 120Hz display on a durable titanium frame.

products.name: iphone 13
products.description: A powerful and capable iPhone with a stunning Super Retina XDR display, the advanced A15 Bionic chip for exceptional performance, and an advanced dual-camera system for incredible photos and videos.

products.name: iphone 14 pro
products.description: Defined by its innovative Dynamic Island, a always-on ProMotion display, and a massive camera upgrade with a 48MP Main sensor, all powered by the cutting-edge A16 Bionic chip.

products.name: HP 14
products.description: A reliable and affordable 14-inch laptop designed for everyday tasks, offering solid performance for work, school, and streaming with a slim and portable design.

products.name: Philips 22 Class Thin Full HD
products.description: A compact 22-inch monitor that delivers sharp Full HD 1080p clarity in a slim, space-saving design, perfect for a clean home office or desktop setup.
